comments:
Using I20060125-0800, I got this exception trying to find unused dependencies for an existing plugin.

java.lang.ClassCastException
at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.search.dependencies.UnusedDependenciesJob.run(UnusedDependenciesJob.java:82)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

I checked in today's build and it is also broken.
It doesn't seem to be related to a specific plugin.
Set as critical since I could not get this feature to work.

Olivier, could you please indicate a specific plugin to try this on?

It works fine on pde.ui for example.

1) Checkout org.eclipse.jdt.core from HEAD.
2) PDE tools>Open dependencies
3) Select org.eclipse.jdt.core
4) Find unused dependencies
=> CCE

It works sometimes. So I move it back to normal. Still pretty annoying though.

Trying it on org.eclipse.jdt.core.tests.model, it seems to work, but after a while I get:
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.NullPointerException)
